description: Sample conversation for testing deadline extraction
scenario: Parent managing various family deadlines and tasks

messages.content: Reminder: Permission slips for the field trip are due by Friday, October 27th. Please sign and return with your child.
Oh no, I almost forgot! Thanks for the reminder.
Hi, this is a reminder to refill Jake's prescription by November 1st. You can call or use the patient portal.
Need to remember - soccer registration for winter season closes November 15th and it's $150.
Your electricity bill of $127.50 is due on November 5th.
Did you winterize the sprinkler system yet? We need to do it before the first freeze, probably by mid-November.
Not yet. I'll add it to the list. Also Emma's book report is due Monday.
Your car insurance renewal documents need to be signed and returned by October 30th to avoid a lapse in coverage.

expectedDeadlines.task: Sign and return car insurance renewal documents
